title: Guinness Fudge Brownies
directions: Preheat oven to 330 degrees F. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together the flaxmeal, spelt flour, cocoa powder, salt, baking powder and brown sugar. In a separate bowl, mix together the Guinness, coconut oil, vanilla and agave nectar. Once smooth, pour the wet ingredients into the dry ones and stir with a wooden spoon until fully incorporated. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake in the oven for 17 minutes. Cool on a wire rack for about two hours and then refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: 1/2 cup plus 3 tablespoons coconut oil, melted
2/3 cup 60% cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips from GhirardelliÂ (or any other kind)
